Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to study the feasibility and impact of installing sliding access doors on subway platforms
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to study the feasibility and impact of installing sliding access doors on subway platforms.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the metropolitan transportation authority to study the feasibility and impact of installing sliding access doors on subway platforms
